content: mini easter egg bunny is created by audrey lilian this is the crochet pattern only not the finished product this pattern is written using us crochet terms this pattern is available in english only the size of the finished toy may vary according to the yarn thickness the hook size and your gauge mini easter egg bunny that i made is 8 cm tall tools and materials needed - 2 5 mm hook - 5 mm safety eyes - cotton yarn in sport weight - fiberfill - scissors - safety pins - tapestry needle - stitch markers or scraps of yarn for markers this pattern is for personal use only you may sell the finished toy made from this pattern but please credit me as the designer hope you enjoy crocheting this mini easter egg bunny
